name: Siyah Anarkali Set
description:
Drape yourself in drama with this magnificent black Anarkali Suit Set. Featuring a gracefully flowing, calf-length Anarkali kurta with a round neckline, this set is crafted from luxurious Silk-blend fabric that catches the light and offers an elegant, weighty drape. The kurta is kept minimalistic, highlighting the richness of the fabric, and is detailed with a subtle gold lace trim on the cuff. The look is completed with complementing straight pants, which feature delicate gold embroidered motifs, and a soft, sheer black dupatta finished with a simple gold border. This set is a perfect blend of timeless tradition and modern subtlety.

Ideal for formal dinners, evening engagements, or office festive parties. Pair it with oxidized silver jhumkas for a perfect contrast.
specifications: Anarkali & Dupatta - Silk Blend with Self-Stripes (Kurta), Soft Organza (Dupatta)
Pants - Silk Blend with Subtle Motif Embroidery
Color - Classic Jet Black with Minimal Gold Accents
No. of Components - Set of 3 (Kurta, Pants, Dupatta)
Embroidery Details - Minimal Gold Embroidery on Kurta Hem/Sleeve; Scattered Gold Motifs on Pants; Gold Trim on Dupatta
Product Highlight - Elegant Silhouette, Rich Self-Weave Fabric, and Minimalist Gold Detailing
Customization - Only Size and Length Of Product

name: Kanak Anarkali Suit
description:
Illuminate your occasion with this striking, vibrant yellow Anarkali Suit Set. The kurta features a classic full-sleeve design with a round neck and an elegant flair, creating a beautiful, light silhouette. It is crafted from a bright, flowing Silk-blend fabric that gives it a beautiful, crisp structure and shine. The rich yellow is perfectly complemented by the contrasting white lace trim detailing the cuff, neckline, and dupatta edges. The set includes matching white straight-fit pants, which feature delicate lace or Schiffli embroidery at the hem. This ensemble is designed for comfort and maximum visual impact.

Ideal for Haldi ceremonies, festive gatherings, or daytime celebrations. Pair it with simple gold or pearl jewellery.
specifications: Anarkali - Silk Blend (Fabric), Flared A-Line Cut
Pants - Silk Blend with Lace Detail (Fabric), Straight Fit
Color - Bright, Luminous Yellow with Crisp White Accents
No. of Components - Set of 3 (Kurta, Pants, Dupatta)
Embroidery Details - White Lace Trim on Kurta/Dupatta; Hemline Embroidery on Pants
Product Highlight - Vibrant Colour, Flowing Flare, and Contrast White Detailing
Customization - Only Size and Length Of Product

name: Parijaat Angrakha Suit Set
description:
Step into a serene garden with this exquisitely printed Anarkali Suit Set. The long, full-sleeved Anarkali kurta features a delicate floral print in shades of pink, green, and lavender set against a soft blue-grey dupion silk fabric with light golden zari embroidery. The fitted bodice flows out into a lovely flared ghera. It is complemented by matching blue-grey straight pants and finished with a striking sheer lavender organza dupatta that features a subtle gold trim along the border. This set is the perfect embodiment of graceful, soft femininity.

Ideal for formal brunches, daytime celebrations, or relaxed festive occasions. Pair it with simple antique silver earrings to complete the look.
specifications: Anarkali & Pants - Dupion Silk Blend (Fabric), Flared Anarkali Cut
Color - Blue-Grey Base with Multi-Color Floral Print, Lavender Dupatta
No. of Components - Set of 3 (Kurta, Pants, Dupatta)
Embroidery Details - All-over Floral Digital with light zari embroidery, Border Trim on Dupatta
Product Highlight - Pastel Color Palette and Elegant Print Contrast with Lavender Dupatta
Customization - Only Size and Length Of Product

name: Neelam Anarkali Suit Set
description:
Embrace royal sophistication with this gorgeous Electric Blue Anarkali Suit. Featuring a comfortable, flared Anarkali-style kurta and matching wide-legged pants, this set is crafted from a crisp Silk Blend fabric that achieves a beautiful structure and sheen. The sleeves feature delicate net detailing, while the sheer Organza dupatta adds an ethereal finishing touch with its contrasting border. It's a perfect statement piece for any festive occasion.

Ideal for formal gatherings, evening events, or traditional celebrations. Pair it with diamond or silver jewellery.
specifications: Length of kurta - 48 inches (Approximate Anarkali length)
Embroidery Details - Intricate net detailing on sleeves and pants
Product Highlight - Flared Anarkali Silhouette and Rich Fabric Sheen
Customization - Only Size and Length Of Product
